existing_features.title: Apply a subtle animated glowing border that continuously rotates around the border of the button located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/button[1], creating a “live / waiting to be pressed” effect while preserving the button’s existing size, layout, and click behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a subtle animated glowing border that rotates around the selected button (live/waiting-to-be-pressed effect).

projectName: Add rotating subtle animated glowing border to the selected button
